extendedInfo.description: Let your phone work for you. CritiCall might be the most important app you get for your Android phone.Tired of your phone waking you up in the middle of the night? Do you turn your phone to silent but worry about missing an emergency call from your kids, parents, significant other? Afraid to turn the volume on your phone down for fear youâll miss that call or text from an important client?âFortunately, with CritiCall, those worries become a thing of the past.â â Android Authority, 10/21/12Rest easy and sleep peacefully knowing youâll never miss a critical call or text again. Set critical contacts so your phone will ring when those contacts call or text, even when your phone is on silent. CritiCall is relied on by members of search and rescue teams, expectant fathers, people with older or sick family members, parents, and business professionals to ensure they never miss âthatâ call.âCritiCall solved one of the most obvious problems with modern smartphones: the lack of a selective silent feature.â â Android Police, 2/6/13One of Android Guys' "10 Apps and Games Worth Exploring" â 1/31/13	FEATURES Ò Receive important calls and texts, even when your phone is on silent Ò Scheduler lets you customize when certain contacts can reach you Ò âNo Worryâ Auto-Resume feature lets you turn CritiCall off for those times you absolutely cannot have your phone ring, and automatically turns CritiCall back on for you. Ò Unlimited groups lets you customize settings for more than one person at a time Ò Customizable ringtones/notifications Ò Emergency Call Override rings your phone when the same person calls you more than once within 5 minutes (Pro Feature) Ò Adjustable Repeating Reminders ensures you never miss an important call or text even when you are away from your phone for a time (Pro Feature)Our e-mail is simplyapplied@gmail.com. We take customer service very seriously and typically respond to all emails within 24 hours, usually faster.We are committed to providing a high quality application that exceeds your expectations and makes your phone more useful for you. Please let us know if you have any issues with our app so we can address the issue. Recent comments from customers:âThank you for the level of customer service yâall have showed me.  That level of service is rare these days.  Especially with a 2$ product...â â 1/23/13âThank you so much I really appreciate all that you've done and help work with me on the issues that I was havingâ â 1/8/13â... actually you have been the best with the updates and keeping me posted...awesome service...â â 12/11/12âI really have been very happy with the program. Works the best of all I have tried. And the support has no competition!â â 12/11/12We welcome suggestions for new features and value our customerâs comments highly in our decision-making process. If youâre unhappy with our app in any way, please give us a chance to fix the issue before leaving negative comments. We canât respond to these comments and many times the issues listed are either out of our control or easy to fix. We will make every reasonable effort to fix your problem.LEGAL STUFFDue to the number of factors which can impact performance of apps on mobile phones,  SIMPLY APPLIED DOES NOT MAKE ANY GUARANTEES, EITHER EXPLICIT OR IMPLIED, THAT CRITICALL WILL ALWAYS WORK AS DESCRIBED, NOR DOES SIMPLY APPLIED ASSUME ANY RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY DAMAGES ASSOCIATED WITH CRITICALLâS PERFORMANCE OR FAILURE TO PERFORM. SIMPLY APPLIED'S LIABILITY IS LIMITED TO THE PURCHASE PRICE OF THE APP.Keywords - volume manager, ringtone manager, ringtones, notifications, notification manager, notification control, silence, silent, silent call, silent mode, silent text, silence phone, silent phone, quiet, quiet mode, silent ringtone, silent notifications, volume override, important calls, critical calls, SMS, silence ringer, SMS notifications, SMS ringtones, privacy, sleep, sleep control, Apple, Do Not Disturb

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work and futures not available
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t work! The device stays quiet when contacts marked as critical try to reach me.  I use a Android Samsung s7652 DUOS. Also the schedule function isn\'t available.
reviews.author: Emiel Sch\303\266nfeld

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is the only one that actually works for me. My phone is silent 90 % of the time, but I don\'t want to miss a call from my family, I also like that I can do sms only on certain VIP contact and not others.
reviews.author: Melissa Van Horn

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I bought this app in good faith that my critical contacts would ring through even when my phone is on silent. That has yet to happen. Waste of money!
reviews.author: Chris Dinesen Rogers

reviews.title: Just vibrates on calls.
reviews.comment: Waste of money, should have stuck with free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app but...
reviews.comment: Recently it stopped playing the custom ringtone for my critical contacts. This is the reason I wanted this app, my default message tone isn\'t loud enough to wake me up (intentionally) so I wanted to make sure certain people could always reach me. Developer is very responsive, hope he finds a fix soon.
reviews.author: Jennifer Criso

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app. If you\'re like me and set your phone to silent, but can\'t miss important calls/texts from family or anyone else who is important then this is the app you need. I worked with dev to test the bug fixes with the new version. Everything works as expected. Chris is very quick to respond to questions. Worth a lot more than the purchase price.
reviews.author: David Jones

reviews.title: The best!!
reviews.comment: Not only is this application amazing and does EXACTLY what it says it does, but Simply Applied is the greatest!  This app is perfect!
reviews.author: Ben Israel

reviews.title: Works Very Well
reviews.comment: Everything works great but since update I lost the option to make the ringer go back to silent after the call.
reviews.author: Jason Fessmann

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: What happened to the widget?  No widget after last update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Have Galaxy Note, just bought this POS. Loaded the critical numbers, put the Note phone on silent, tried to ring from the critical numbers... Galaxy Note doesn\'t ring!  Please fix this POS!!! Then I\'ll give it 5 stars, meaning, it does what it is advertised to do.... Duh!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thunderbolt
reviews.comment: Great. I wish it had specific times that you could have it turn on & off. My moms bf beats her & she won\'t leave. This way I can turn my phone on silent and make sure her emergency calls always come through. THANK YOU
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wss great
reviews.comment: Now I cant into setting to add override to text messages. Would you please address this issue.  Contacted company and update coming soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GS3
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my GS3. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: looking for app like this one for ages thank you very much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent little utility that is an absolute necessity on all my phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it does exactly what it says
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app and it is absolutely perfect what I need. if I could give it more than 5 stars I would quite happily do so. congradulations to the developers on a great product.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: Love this app, and think it should come standard on all phones! The only problem I have with the app is the widget. It works perfectly for a few days then won\'t allow me to click it to turn the app on and off. Other than that, great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sam fas 2.3.5 stock
reviews.comment: Can\'t get it to work. Just had my wife call me five times in all sorts of configurations using different toggles. Get the notification in the notification bar. If I click on the notification while the phone call is coming through it will begin to ring but that defeats the purpose. Refund and uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Keeps certain people & 800#s from calling me all hours of the night, but let\'s certain ones thru. Handy widget means you don\'t really have to open app after seeing it up. Awesome app is what I needed. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.comment: Work as advertized on my Samsung Galaxy 2. Thank you very much, very importent for me functionality added.
reviews.author: A Google User
